attributes.action: declare whether he stands by his claim to have abolished boom and bust?
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Since being elected to Government in 1997 the current Prime Minister has made many claims to have improved the British Economy. One of his proudest boasts whilst Chancellor was that he has set conditions which meant no more boom and bust. When will he apologise to the British People for such a wild claim?

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
